title: Will Backroom Shakeup Put Ineos Grenadiers Back on Top? ‘This Team has a Proud Legacy’
content:
Several key staffing changes underscore Ineos Grenadiers reboot: 'The goal of reclaiming the top step of the podium.'

Read the full article at Will Backroom Shakeup Put Ineos Grenadiers Back on Top? ‘This Team has a Proud Legacy’ on Velo.
author: ahood
